title: Well Managed 4BD with GORGEOUS Kitchen - June Occupancy
description:
Available early June | Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, clean credit history, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history.
Welcome to 6940 Sherwood Rd! Tucked right next to City Avenue in Overbrook Farms, this 4 bedroom / 3.5 bathroom home is bursting with character! Fantastic features include hardwood floors, a GORGEOUS kitchen, high ceilings, 2 fireplaces, lots of storage space, a huge yard, a screened-in sunroom, a long driveway with room for multiple cars, a shed out back and a front porch with classic white pillars – an impressive face on this gorgeous home. Start your tour in the front yard, with winding cement paths, paved driveway, and rosebushes lining your open front porch accented by a vibrant red front door to complete the vintage look. Follow the driveway around back and you’ll pass the side door (enters right into the kitchen for added convenience), a screened in sunroom with a ceiling fan for comfortable summer evenings, and finally, a huge yard with a shed for additional storage. Inside, the home is just as spacious with a lovely foyer, family room offering fireplace and large front windows, dining room just off the kitchen, and another room in the rear with a second fireplace and backyard access – perfect for a TV or game room. The kitchen is elegant with off-white farmhouse style cabinetry, granite countertops, a breakfast bar, double in-wall ovens, a gas range, microwave, and a double door stainless steel refrigerator. The finished basement is a cozy, carpeted space, with a full bathroom and laundry room attached. Upstairs, you’ll find 4 bedrooms – two smaller and two larger, each with spacious closets and hardwood floors. The primary bedroom is one of the larger, street side rooms, and offers a full bathroom with glass shower stall, and access to the finished attic. The attic offers extra storage space, and would make wonderful office or creative space. 3 window A/C units are included. Home is setup of Verizon Fios. Schedule a tour today!

title: Private 1 BR + Office with Gated Yard
description:
Renovated two-floor rear apartment that includes a spacious, private gated yard on beautiful 6th street. You'll have wonderful neighbors on all sides, and find that this apartment is incredibly quiet since it's in the rear of the building.
The unit has a galley kitchen and granite countertop, large living room, large bedroom, office and bathroom. Both the bedroom and living rooms have ceiling fans. Plenty of closet space upstairs (2 large closets) available for clothes!
Private basement with washer and dryer (no charge to use) along with private storage and access to the backyard.
This unit is well above the floodplain so you don't have to worry (like you would about a unit closer to the river) about getting flooded out by a hurricane.
PERKS
1. No yard care for you to worry about! Lawn cutting and bush trimming are taken care of by the landlord.
2. No bills due for the Sewer, Water + Trash fees -- paid by the landlord.
3. This unit has 2 AC units for you to use during the summer months.
You are responsible for monthly rent, gas heat, electric and internet/phone. Internet options are Comcast or Fios (no dishes).
Street parking.
Pets will be considered (and if approved, require an additional non-refundable security deposit).
Must have good references and provide 2 months' bank statements, 2 pay stubs, and complete an application.
To move in, you must pay 1st month's rent and 1 month's security deposit (and the pet security deposit when applicable).
It's an ideal location because you are 8 minutes from the King of Prussia Mall, have 2 stops to choose from for the high-speed rail line and are minutes from the Norristown transit center with the regional rail to Center City and buses available to go directly to NYC. Plus you have access to the bike path (with a plan to run the bike path extension directly through Bridgeport soon) along with great restaurants such as Taphouse 23, Bridgeport BrewPub, Frosty Falls, Franzone's Pizza, Dino's and more. There's also a beautiful park within 5 minutes walk with a 1/4 mile track and a dog run.

title: First-floor unit in the quiet Tahoe section
description: First-floor unit in the quiet Tahoe section of Village 2 with great natural light and a gated front patio with an extended bedroom perfect for a sitting area or light-filled home office. Private back yard patio. Updated kitchen and bath. Plenty of closet space and outdoor storage shed for bikes, sporting equipment or seasonal items. Village 2, a private residential condominium community in a park-like setting, is beautifully landscaped and well maintained. two-car parking, tennis and sports courts, and six swimming pools. All this plus easy access to one of two walking paths into the fantastic dining, shopping, and entertainment opportunities of New Hope and Lambertville; the "tow path" for walks or biking, and the Bucks County Playhouse. Minutes to Route 202. Easy commute to Doylestown, Newtown, Princeton and Philadelphia. 2 domestic pets allowed.

title: Renovated Studio Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Gym, Near Restaurants
description:
The studio apartment home at 410 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. This home on the 4th floor has large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at nearby Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, or the Reading Terminal Market. Shop at retail stores such as Barnes & Nobles, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, Indochino, lululemon, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, Sephora, Nordstrom Rack, and L'Occitane. Dine at local restaurants such as Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Marathon Grill, Alice Pizza, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe. Select a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Pick up a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Savor a gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. There are many banks nearby, including TD Bank in the building.
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with wifi, cozy seating areas, a pool table, a conference room, a kitchen, and more!
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Online resident portal for maintenance requests and rent payments
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 4th floor
* Wood floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)

title: Don't drop the ball on this 3 bed 2 bath Fitler Square home!
description:
515 S. 27th Street – Available August 1
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

High end finishes, modern details & quality construction distinguish this character home apart from all the others.
